tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Post and Core,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Implant Retained Dentures,
review:
Good explanation of the procedure and patient care.
My Motherinlaw age 86. Had to go through cleaning, post and core, upper teeth crowning, lower jaw denture replacement in July 2023. 

Better to ask for the full details of the procedure and fees before starting of the procedure. sometimes some cost occurs during the process, to be aware , be prepared and ask the Dr. before hand.

Though costly, reliable. All the doubts are well explained and cleared by Dr.Bharath and Dr. Prabhakar (Denture), well coordinated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ******* ** ** ****** ****** ********** * my entire family consults for the past 10 years. His professional approach, well explained staged treatment procedures, risk benefit, cost benefit explanation, treatment modalities suggestion and multiple options offering based on budget are things we much appreciate and thankful for. Dental issues I had reached the expected treatment goals. Dr. Bharath also strongly believes in time management and schedules appointments that never are late or postponed. He also engages in caring and educative discussions with patients during those hour long procedures which eases patients. Would strongly recommend anyone having dental ailments consult with Dr. Bharath.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback Ms. Kayalvizhi.K. Your feedback motivates us to work with dedication and deliver the best possible service. Wish you a very good health!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Thank you so much for the excellent dental care you have given me. Your professional expertise, integrity and compassionate concern for the person on the other end of drill are most appreciated. Thank you for giving me back my SMILE.”
Thank you for going over the opg X-rays in detail and explaining the problem. I also appreciate how quickly you were able reduce my severe pain by giving priscription over phone call WATS app without meeting you in person. I am impressed !!

Thank you again for your support, it made a real difference for me.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback Mr. Alex.  Hope to treat you with the same care and concern in the future. Wish you a very good health!
